SCRIPT.MSCRI:
$errors = 0 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY !-----------Building command arguments------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_RESTART_APP_LOGGING_PARAMS : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
: ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.STORE", "RESTART-WEBAPP-WIN", T, N : SET &UC4RB_PS_SCR_NAME# = "restart-webapp-win.ps1"
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# NE "" : IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PASSWORD# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PASSWORD# ! Decrypt passphrase : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD $UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF : ENDIF
: SWITCH &UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS# : CASE "WinRM" : SET &JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOME_DIR# : SET &JB_HOST# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOST# : SET &JB_PORT# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_PORT# : SET &JB_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_USERNAME# : SET &JB_SERVER_GRPS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_SERVER_GRPS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_SERVER_GRPS# : SET &JB_APP_NAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_APP_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_APP_NAME#
: SET &UC4RB_WINRM_SCRIPT_FILEPATH#="&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#cmd_winrm.txt" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_WINRM_SCRIPT_FILEPATH# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = '.\&$RUNID#\&UC4RB_PS_SCR_NAME# "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_OPERATING_MODE#" "&JB_HOME_DIR#" "&JB_HOST#" "&JB_PORT#" "&JB_USERNAME#" "&JB_SERVER_GRPS#" "&JB_APP_NAME#" "$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD"' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : P "WinRm script: &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#" Set-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' ((Get-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#') | foreach {$_.replace('$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD',$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD)}) try { : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WINRM_CREATE_PSSESSION : SET &UC4RB_WINRM_SOURCEPATH#="&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WINRM_COPY_PATH try { : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WINRM_RUN_PSSCRIPT } finally { : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WINRM_REMOVE_PATH } } catch { $errors=1 $error.Exception }finally { : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WINRM_REMOVE_PSSESSION } : CASE "SSH" ! Create 2 files for UNIX as well as WINDOWS. : SET &JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOME_DIR# : SET &JB_HOST# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOST# : SET &JB_PORT# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_PORT# : SET &JB_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_USERNAME# : SET &JB_SERVER_GRPS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_SERVER_GRPS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_SERVER_GRPS# : SET &JB_APP_NAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_APP_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SSH_ARGS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_APP_NAME#
: SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = 'powershell .\&$RUNID#\&UC4RB_PS_SCR_NAME# "\"&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_OPERATING_MODE#\"" "\"&JB_HOME_DIR#\"" "\"&JB_HOST#\"" "\"&JB_PORT#\"" "\"&JB_USERNAME#\"" "\"&JB_SERVER_GRPS#\"" "\"&JB_APP_NAME#\"" "\"$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD\""' : P "INFO: Windows Script: &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#" : SET &TEMP_WIN#="&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#cmd_win.txt" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &TEMP_WIN# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE Set-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' ((Get-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#') | foreach {$_.replace('$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD',$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD)})
: ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.STORE", "RESTART-WEBAPP-UNIX", T, N : SET &UC4RB_SH_SCR_NAME# = "restart-webapp-unix.sh"
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: SET &JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOME_DIR# : SET &JB_HOST# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOST# : SET &JB_PORT# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_PORT# : SET &JB_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_USERNAME# : SET &JB_SERVER_GRPS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_SERVER_GRPS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_SERVER_GRPS# : SET &JB_APP_NAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_APP_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_APP_NAME#
: SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = 'sed -i ''s/\r$//'' ./&$RUNID#/&UC4RB_SH_SCR_NAME#;bash ./&$RUNID#/&UC4RB_SH_SCR_NAME# "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_OPERATING_MODE#" "&JB_HOME_DIR#" "&JB_HOST#" "&JB_PORT#" "&JB_USERNAME#" "&JB_SERVER_GRPS#" "&JB_APP_NAME#" "$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD"' : P "INFO: UNIX Script: &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#" : SET &TEMP_UNIX#="&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#cmd_unix.txt" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &TEMP_UNIX# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE Set-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' ((Get-Content '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#') | foreach {$_.replace('$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD',$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD)})
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_SSH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_ARGS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_DETECT_OSNAME if($UC4RB_SSH_OSNAME -eq "WINDOWS" ) { $cmdFile='&TEMP_WIN#' } else { $cmdFile='&TEMP_UNIX#' } java -jar "&UC4RB_SSH_JARPATH#" -action RunScriptAction &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# -cmdfile $cmdFile -sourcepath " &$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK# " : CASE "Agent" : SET &JB_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOME_DIR# : SET &JB_HOST# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_HOST# : SET &JB_PORT# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_PORT# : SET &JB_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_USERNAME# : SET &JB_SERVER_GRPS# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_SERVER_GRPS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_SERVER_GRPS# : SET &JB_APP_NAME# = &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_APP_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &JB_APP_NAME# try{ & "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#&UC4RB_PS_SCR_NAME#" "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_OPERATING_MODE#" "&JB_HOME_DIR#" "&JB_HOST#" "&JB_PORT#" "&JB_USERNAME#" "&JB_SERVER_GRPS#" "&JB_APP_NAME#" "$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD" } catch { $errors=1 $error.Exception } : ENDSWITCH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS __uc_return($errors)
